item.title: My Contact
item.description:
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out!

    Mail::send('emails.contact', $data, function($message) use ($data){
    $message->from($data['email']);
    $message->to('example@domain.com');
    $message->subject($data['subject']);
});

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Dan. I’m a 21 year old student at Cal Poly Pomona on track to get a degree in Electronic Systems & Engineering Technology. Like many kids in my field, I grew up playing video games, which was my gateway into the world of computing. The PlayStation 2 was one of my first consoles, and I remember playing the same 6 or so games religiously, which meant I was always discovering nuances and tricks about the game engine. I don’t game as much as I used to, but the systematic mindset I developed playing games has found its way into many other parts of my life, particularly my career.
